description: Dialect works like a charm! Now I don't need to open another browser tab just to translate some words. Nice!
If this is a common task for you it is nice to have a local app.
summary: Faster than opening up Google Translate

description: As my summary says, this is a fantastic little app and thus far I've had no problems with running into a quota or anything similar. I have no idea what backend it uses for translation, though it's seems to be quite accurate.
Funktioniert einwandfrei und die Vorlesefunktion ist auch großartig
